Style/ItBlockParameter.description:
Description

Checks for blocks with one argument where `it` block parameter can be used.
Style/ItBlockParameter.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: allow_single_line (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['allow_single_line', 'only_numbered_parameters', 'always', 'disallow'] (type: list)
